attributes.action: Save Misterton C of E First School
attributes.additional_details: Their decision to make this change is based on a 2 million pound deficit that Wadham School have, and by changing the school system they believe that this should stop their debt growing. Misterton C of E First School is a thriving village school and the children get a high level of education there; the council are clearly only looking at the financial side of this, not the educational benefits of all of these young children.
attributes.background: Re-evaluate the council's decision to change the current 3 tier school system to a 2 tier system, which will result in the closure of Misterton C of E First School.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Somerset County Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a petition to Somerset County Council calling on them to reconsider this decision, if that is something you'd like to happen. You can find out more about how to do this here: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/our-information/petitions/.
